PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03212023-03-31PSPC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Appointing Ernst & Young LLP as the Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the Canada Post Corporation
PrecisOrder appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP as AUDITOR; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Appointing Ernst & Young LLP as the Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the Canada Post Corporation
precis: Order appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP as AUDITOR; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2023.
